name: STAR WARS Throwback Pack
description:
Capture a deranged Dark Jedi. Defeat the Empire’s doomsday army. Race against the universe’s best Podracers. Experience epic Lightsaber™ duels from Episode III. Oh, and save Naboo. Do it all in the STAR WARS™ Throwback Pack, featuring:

• STAR WARS™ Bounty Hunter™
• STAR WARS™: Dark Forces
• STAR WARS™: Racer Revenge
• STAR WARS™: Episode III Revenge of the Sith™
• STAR WARS™ Starfighter™

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.
